humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, sentinel lymph nodes 1, 2, and 3 from the right axilla were excised and examined. The report states that 'One lymph node, negative for metastases (0/1)' for each of the three lymph nodes. This indicates that there are no metastatic carcinomas found in the assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0, which means no regional lymph node metastasis.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N0. This is based on the pathology report which states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/3.' This means that three sentinel lymph nodes were examined and none of them contained metastases.
